Articles.Content:
Wait..didn't you just leave there? Why, yes I did.

But having downloaded KAS, Kethane, and Ironcross mods I finally feel like I have something interesting to do in space. So first, I added life support to my Cherryh manned station.

We won't need so much air if Jeb would stop breathing so much.

Still some good views from the crew quarters...

...and tons of power! The thing is covered in solar panels.

My next step was to scan the Mun for Kethane. So I designed a very simple sat for Mun orbit.

It did a good job but sadly there were no deposits under my base. Still, I think one is close - about 11 something kilometers.

I then designed a C-Rover. A C-Rover is a Rover with two KAS winches on it.

I dropped it on the Mun, unmanned. The idea is it can link two items if they are too far away or if I don't wish to try to move them and maybe damage them. Don't worry, F-Rovers are in the future.

And of course I had to bring a crew member back with a Portable Life Support Unit.

Well, not that portable...And yes, he had to hike over and recover all the Rovers and park them next to the house.

Edited August 20, 2013 by Valley
typos and all kinds of mess ups...
